content.rendered:
Are you attending Gamesforum Barcelona this year?

The One-day Gamesforum Laser Event focuses on Ad Monetization in F2P mobile games and features an impressive lineup of speakers and moderators.

wappier will also be there and our very own Ted Verani will be moderating their Gamesforum Unfiltered Live, in which the leading minds in Ad Monetisation will offer their take on what’s happening in mobile games now.

Ted will also hold a talk about Next Best Action, wappier’s ML-powered framework that produces real-time personalized offers.

wappier’s VP of Business Development Ted Verani will be joining other leaders in the mobile games space to discuss F2P Ad Monetization during this year’s Gamesforum Barcelona, tomorrow, February 10.
